pageContext.claim: “Remember it was Buzzfeed that released the totally discredited “Dossier,” paid for by Crooked Hillary Clinton and the Democrats (as opposition research), on which the entire Russian probe is based!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump repeats a falsehood -- that the FBI's investigation of ties between Russia and Trump campaign started with the disclosure of the dossier assembled by a former British intelligence agent. Rather, the counterintelligence probe was prompted because Trump campaign aide George Papadopoulos indicated to a diplomat that the Russians had obtained internal emails from the Hillary Clinton campaign.
